com.kroy.game.scenes

Class MinigameScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kroy.game.scenes.Scene
      • com.kroy.game.scenes.MinigameScene

  • public class MinigameScene
extends Scene
    Class created by Team Septagon This is used to handle all of the features and events of the minigame

        Parameters:
        font - The games font
        cam - The game camera
        passedEngine - The engine that triggered the minigame
        passedPatrol - The patrol that triggered the minigame
        sceneManager - SceneManager used to change the scenes of the game
